page.title: 12 MASHAM SCHOOL
page.content: The modern school has four classes; two infant classes and the other two junior.There is a large hall,a library and an office.There has been some discussion recently about whether a new school may have to be built with the knowledge that 50 new houses are to be built in Masham. Mrs.D.Proud is the school secretary and comes in three days a week. Mrs.J.Jackson is the cleaner in charge. Mrs.Pybus, Mrs.Cook and Mrs.Scott are the dinner ladies.The dinners are brought over from Bedale Primary School in containers. A new Governing Body of 11 Governors has just been established.The school has an active P.T.A. which provides money for things like computers and swimming lessons that we would be unable to afford otherwise.
